program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 09.06.2006 live ticker : germany 4:2 costa rica review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . welcome to the world cup kick-off ! !
the wait is over .
germany , the host nation , finally makes good on all the promises and delivers the globe 's most prestigious soccer event to the world .
the fifa world cup stadium münchen plays host to the opening game between jürgen klinsmann 's germany and central american hopefuls costa rica .
stay tuned for all the action as the world cup action unfolds here with dw-world.de 's live ticker less than 45 minutes to go !
the capacity crowd in the fifa world cup stadium münchen has already enjoyed a spectacular opening ceremony with traditional bavarian dancers and a host of international stars .
stars from the history of the world cup have also been paraded in front of the expectant fans as the clock ticks down to kick-off team line-ups announced the teams have been announced and there is no place in the germany team for the injured michael ballack .
tim borowski takes his place in midfield and bernd schneider takes over the captaincy .
germany : lehmann jens , friedrich arne , schweinsteiger bastian , frings torsten , klose miroslav , lahm philipp , mertesacker per , borowski tim , schneider bernd -lrb- c -rrb- , podolski lukas , metzelder christoph costa rica : porras jose -lrb- c -rrb- , marin luis , umana michael , martinez gilberto , fonseca danny , solis mauricio , wanchope paulo , centeno walter , gomez ronald , gonzalez leonardo , sequeira douglas klinsmann sticks with winning line-up germany coach jürgen klinsmann has gone with the same team - minus ballack - who dispensed with costa rica 's central american counterparts colombia 3-0 in germany 's last test game with lehmann in goal , the back four remains arne friedrich , philipp lahm , per mertesacker and christoph metzelder .
the midfield consists of schweinsteiger , frings , schneider and borowski while lukas podolski and miroslav klose start up front .
the crowd awaits the teams the german and costa rican teams are lining up in the bowels of the stadium , ready to exit to what is expected to be a deafening reception in munich as they prepare to get the 2006 fifa world cup underway .
the stadium is a sea of colors and a cauldron of song as the flags of the teams are brought out onto the pitch precipitating the arrival of the teams .
the teams exit to rapturous applause germany and costa rica come out onto the prestine pitch as the world cup gets ready to get underway .
the costa rican national anthem sounds out with enthusiastic singing from the team and their supporters .
the german anthem is belted out by the host team and the fans respectfully join in .
it is a more solemn chorus than the preceding anthem but one of pride as germany prepares to host the greatest soccer show on earth .

the 2006 world cup gets underway costa rica kicks off to begin the first game in the 2006 fifa world cup .
1. min .
an early surge through the midfield from costa rica results in the first free kick .
1. min .
the free kick is chipped inot the far post but its too long for the striker centeno .
2. min .
germany get their first chance to build an attack on the left flank with schweinsteiger and lahm working well .
a hard tackle from marin ends their progress .
2. min .
frings long range effort flies just over germany build from the midfield and the ball falls to frings who rifles in a dipping long range shot which just flies over .
6. min .
goal germany ! ! 6. min .
philipp lahm curls in a beauty left-back philipp lahm cuts in from the flank , drops his shoulder and fires a curling long range effort over porras into the far right hand corner .
a great opening goal ! 9. min .

9. min .
germany are running riot over the costa rica with schweinsteiger and lahm ripping the left hand side to pieces .
9. min .
germany are running riot over costa rica with schweinsteiger and lahm ripping the left hand side to pieces .
9. min .
germany are running riot over costa rica with schweinsteiger and lahm ripping the left hand side to pieces .

goal costa rica 12. min .

goal germany klose gathers a cut back from scweinsteiger to sweep germany back into the lead ! 18. min .
great work from germany for the goal bernd schneider laid a lovely ball back from the right flank to catch schweinsteiger 's run into the box and the clever ball to klose left the striker with the easy task to knock in germany 's second .
20. min .
podolski fires in a rocket lukas podolski looks to increase the lead by rifling in a 20 meter shot which porras fails to hold at the first attempt .
he gathers at the second and the danger passes .
24. min .
despite being two-one down , the costa ricans are battling hard .
germany are faster on the break and looking dangerous but the hosts are having to defend staunchly as costa rica continue to threaten .
27. min .
again schweinsteiger is played in by schneider .
the winger dances past one challenge and threads a ball to borowski in the box .
his shot is blocked at the last minute .
29. min .
danny fonseca gets the first card 29. min .
costa rica 's midfielder gets booked for a harsh challenge on borowski .
35. min .
costa rica try and beat the offside trap again as they did on their first goal but this time the flag rules against the attempt on goal .
41. min .
schweinsteiger whips in a low corner from the right which evades everyone except christoph metzelder at the far post .
he waves a boot at the ball and it balloons over the bar .
an attacker in the same position may have made it 3-1 .
45. min .
half-time sounds with germany out on top half-time : germany go into the break in control of the game by way of goals , possession and chances .
costa rica look to have run out of ideas but there is still a whiff of danger in their attacks .
there could well be more goals in this game for both sides .
45. min .
second half : germany kick off the second half gets underway with germany leading costa rica 2-1 .
the host nation look to capitalize on their showing at the end of the first period and sew the game up .
costa rica will be looking for a way back into the match .
45. min .
germany start by firing in a rising shot from tom borowski just over the bar within seconds of the restart .
50. min .
germany continue to push forward and are frustrating the costa ricans .
a chipped cross from schneider is headed just wide by borowski .
55. min .
klinsmann gets david odonkor and oliver neuville warming up on the sidelines as he considers his options .
concentration seems to be slipping with some of the germany players and they have been forced into mistakes by the costa ricans in the past five minutes .
60. min .
goal germany 60. min .
klose follows up to make it 3-1 lahm sends over an out-swinging cross which klose heads goalwards .
porras saves but klose follows up and lifts the ball over the keeper and into the roof of the net .
65. min .
germany are coasting now with a two-goal cushion but look to score more goals and kill the game off .
paulo wanchope is a lone figure as costa rica gets everyone behind the ball .
67. min .
costa rica bring on jarvis drummond for gilberto martinez .
69. min .
philipp lahm is having an enjoyable afternoon on the left flank .
the left back races past two defenders on the wing , cuts inside before bearing down on goal .
he tries to poke the ball under porras but gets no power and the keeper saves easily .
71. min .
sebastian kehl enters the fray klinsmann takes off the hard-working borowski for sebastian kehl to freshen the midfield .
72. min .
goal costa rica 72. min .
wanchope gets his second paulo wanchope gets his and costa rica 's second as confusion reigns in the german defense .
wanchope slips through the two central defenders to recieve a lofted ball and hesitates slightly before stroking the ball past jens lehmann who stays rooted to the spot .
78. min .
costa rica substitution mauricio solis comes off for bolanos as costa rica look to stage a shocking comeback .
78. min .
two-goal klose comes off oliver neuville comes on for germany 's two-goal hero miro klose .
80. min .
germany want the game won and per mertesacker thumps a header straight at porras as the hosts search for a way to kill off the resurgent costa ricans .
85. min .
schneider loses position in the box and is lucky not get booked for the dive that follows .
the advantage is played to costa rica and the counter-attack begins .
86. min .
goal germany 86. min .
frings lets rip from 40 meters !
an absolute rocket from torsten frings puts the game beyond costa rica 's reach with a monster shot which flie into the top right hand corner from 40 meters out .
schweinsteiger played the ball square into the midfielder 's path and he hit it on the run .
90. min .
germany substitution david odonkor comes on for bernd schneider 90. min .
costa rica substitution azofeifa comes on for gomez .
90 + 3. min .
germany win the opening game the whistle goes and germany wins the match 4-2 and starts the 2006 world cup in style . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

south american surprise puts ecuador even with germany -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 09.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 18.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 09.06.2006 south american surprise puts ecuador even with germany großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador 's edison mendez , right , congratulates teammate agustin delgado the 2006 world cup did n't take long to deliver it 's first surprise result .
ecuador shutout a favored poland side in gelsenkirchen friday night and took a big step toward moving into the next round . stuck in a group with the host nation , both poland and ecuador knew a win in their opening game would be crucial to their world cup campaign and were aiming for three points before suffering though a match against home favorite germany . carlos tenorio broke the deadlock in the 24th minute with a stooping header and agustin delgado made the points safe for the south americans with a simple tap-in 10 minutes from time . a long throw-in from the right touchline was flicked on by the gangly delgado and tenerio 's angled header just eluded poland keeper artur boruc 's outstretched hand for his sixth goal in 30 international appearances . ecuador killed off the contest in the 80th minute when substitute ivan kaviedes broke the offside trap before sliding the ball across goal and giving delgado an easy tap-in . familiar territory for poland poland , who have twice finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de germany start cup campaign in style against costa rica world cup hosts and tournament opening act : germany might have been under pressure but their 4-2 win in the opening match against costa rica certainly was n't wracked with nerves .
-lrb- june 9 , 2006 -rrb- world cup 2006 click here for dw-world.de 's complete world cup coverage .
live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker .
www-links dw-world.de 's world cup live ticker click here to keep following the action minute by minute .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 09.06.2006 south american surprise puts ecuador even with germany großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador 's edison mendez , right , congratulates teammate agustin delgado the 2006 world cup did n't take long to deliver it 's first surprise result .
ecuador shutout a favored poland side in gelsenkirchen friday night and took a big step toward moving into the next round . stuck in a group with the host nation , both poland and ecuador knew a win in their opening game would be crucial to their world cup campaign and were aiming for three points before suffering though a match against home favorite germany . carlos tenorio broke the deadlock in the 24th minute with a stooping header and agustin delgado made the points safe for the south americans with a simple tap-in 10 minutes from time . a long throw-in from the right touchline was flicked on by the gangly delgado and tenerio 's angled header just eluded poland keeper artur boruc 's outstretched hand for his sixth goal in 30 international appearances . ecuador killed off the contest in the 80th minute when substitute ivan kaviedes broke the offside trap before sliding the ball across goal and giving delgado an easy tap-in . familiar territory for poland poland , who have twice finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de germany start cup campaign in style against costa rica world cup hosts and tournament opening act : germany might have been under pressure but their 4-2 win in the opening match against costa rica certainly was n't wracked with nerves .

ecuador shutout a favored poland side in gelsenkirchen friday night and took a big step toward moving into the next round . stuck in a group with the host nation , both poland and ecuador knew a win in their opening game would be crucial to their world cup campaign and were aiming for three points before suffering though a match against home favorite germany . carlos tenorio broke the deadlock in the 24th minute with a stooping header and agustin delgado made the points safe for the south americans with a simple tap-in 10 minutes from time . a long throw-in from the right touchline was flicked on by the gangly delgado and tenerio 's angled header just eluded poland keeper artur boruc 's outstretched hand for his sixth goal in 30 international appearances . ecuador killed off the contest in the 80th minute when substitute ivan kaviedes broke the offside trap before sliding the ball across goal and giving delgado an easy tap-in . familiar territory for poland poland , who have twice finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- in their opening game would be crucial to their world cup campaign and were aiming for three points before suffering though a match against home favorite germany . carlos tenorio broke the deadlock in the 24th minute with a stooping header and agustin delgado made the points safe for the south americans with a simple tap-in 10 minutes from time . a long throw-in from the right touchline was flicked on by the gangly delgado and tenerio 's angled header just eluded poland keeper artur boruc 's outstretched hand for his sixth goal in 30 international appearances . ecuador killed off the contest in the 80th minute when substitute ivan kaviedes broke the offside trap before sliding the ball across goal and giving delgado an easy tap-in . familiar territory for poland poland , who have twice finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- south american surprise puts ecuador even with germany -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 09.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 30.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 09.06.2006 south american surprise puts ecuador even with germany großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador 's edison mendez , right , congratulates teammate agustin delgado the 2006 world cup did n't take long to deliver it 's first surprise result .
ecuador shutout a favored poland side in gelsenkirchen friday night and took a big step toward moving into the next round . stuck in a group with the host nation , both poland and ecuador knew a win in their opening game would be crucial to their world cup campaign and were aiming for three points before suffering though a match against home favorite germany . carlos tenorio broke the deadlock in the 24th minute with a stooping header and agustin delgado made the points safe for the south americans with a simple tap-in 10 minutes from time . a long throw-in from the right touchline was flicked on by the gangly delgado and tenerio 's angled header just eluded poland keeper artur boruc 's outstretched hand for his sixth goal in 30 international appearances . ecuador killed off the contest in the 80th minute when substitute ivan kaviedes broke the offside trap before sliding the ball across goal and giving delgado an easy tap-in . familiar territory for poland poland , who have twice finished third at the world cup , in 1974 and in 1982 , enjoyed plenty of possession but were short on ideas in the final third of the pitch , although they did hit the woodwork twice in the closing stages . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ecuador captain ivan hurtado had to leave the game early due to injury it was mainly superb defending by south american four-man defense that kept poland from equalizing early in the second half and gave ecuador their second competitive win away from the thin air of quito , which at 2,850 meters -lrb- 9,350 feet -rrb- above sea level provides a unique soccer atmosphere . the loss was a repeat performance for poland who also lost their opener in the last world cup 2-0 to south korea and did n't get out of the group phase . ecuador , who finished behind brazil in argentina in their qualifying group to reach their second world cup finals , next face costa rica while poland take on hosts germany . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de germany start cup campaign in style against costa rica world cup hosts and tournament opening act : germany might have been under pressure but their 4-2 win in the opening match against costa rica certainly was n't wracked with nerves .

live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 09.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 18.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 09.06.2006 live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . poland vs. ecuador from gelsenkirchen poland and ecuador face each other in the second game of the 2006 fifa world cup at the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen .
after germany got off to a good winning start both teams will have to go for the win to keep up with the group a leaders if they want to finish on top .
match 2 starts soon nerves in germany are beginning to calm after their win against costa rica , but the butterflies are just starting to flutter in the stomachs of soccer fans in poland and ecuador .
stay with dw-world.de for all the action starting at 21:00 utc .
the anthems have started !
the second game of the 2006 world cup is about to get underway as poland and ecuador meet in the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen . here 's a look at the two teams ' line ups : poland : 1 .
boruc artur -lrb- gk -rrb- , 2 .
jop mariusz , 6 .
bak jacek , 7 .
sobolewski radoslaw , 8 .
krzynowek jacek , 9 .
zurawski maciej , 10 .
szymkowiak miroslav , 14 .
zewlakow michal , 15 .
smolarek ebi , 16 .
radomski arkadiusz ecuador : 12 .
mora cristian -lrb- gk -rrb- , 3 .
hurtado ivan -lrb- c -rrb- , 4 .
de la cruz ulises , 8 .
mendez edison , 11 .
delgado agustin , 14 .
castillo segundo , 16 .
valencia luis , 17 .
espinoza giovanny , 18 .
reasco neicer , 20 .
tenorio edwin , 21 .
tenorio carlos referee : toru kamikawa -lrb- japan -rrb- 1. min .
poland-ecuador is underway !
there 's the whistle , and poland start with the ball .
2. min .
poland practices passing poland is keeping control of the ball in their defensive third and win the first foul of the game .
3. min .
poland comes forward on their second drive of the match and the crowd raises its whistles as smolarek falls without receiving a foul .
5. min .
ecuadorian pride ecuador 's goalie mora gets his first chance to handle the ball and show off the ecuadorian colors he 's painted on his face .
7. min .
valencia gets off the first shot of the game , but it was nothing for boruc to worry about as it rolled well wide of goal .
7. min .
corner for poland krzynowek wins a corner but it 's cleared by the defense .
9. min .
ouch .
poland captain bak clears the ball out of the penalty area and is rewarded with an elbow to the head from carlos tenorio .
11. min .
throw in ecuador ecuador win a throw in deep in poland territory and castillo is able to get off a shot boruc handles well .
12. min .
miscommunication mixed signals on the part of poland rob zurawski of a chance on goal as the 1-2 pass is broken up .
14. min .
foul for poland krzynowek wins a foul 35 yards out and takes it himself .
15. min .
high and wide but he puts the ball way above the goal and high into the stands .
18. min .
free kick poland de la cruz tosses smolarek to the ground and poland lines up a kick .
18. min .
set it up again the kick bounces off the wall and poland gets ready for another corner , which they are n't able to turn into a chance on goal .
22. min .
have a seat jop gives tenorio a shove and the ecuadorian goes sailing , but does n't manage to get enough on his head on the ensuing free kick to find the back of the net .
22. min .
goal ecuador 22. min .
long throw , big head mendez flicks on a massive throw in from de la cruz and carlos tenorio proves how dangerous he can be heading the ball past a diving boruc to score his first goal with the national team .
26. min .
ecuador energized the goal has brought new life into what looked like an initially lackadaisical ecuadorian side .
now the passes are getting crisper and reaching their target more often .
28. min .
another long throw , but no conversion de la cruz tosses in another streaker that falls to delgado 's foot , but he puts it over the crossbar .
30. min .
radomski gives up foul poland gives up another foul , but this one is well out of ecuador 's shooting distance .
31. min .
yellow for hurtado the ecuadorian captain gets the first card of the game for steamrolling radomski .
33. min .
another chance for ecuador de la cruz takes another walk with the ball through the polish defense but his shot is cleared by the defense .
35. min .
smolarek gets yellow smolarek slides into edwin tenorio with an extended leg and gets a well-deserved booking .
38. min .
boruc stops rifle mendez fires a shot through a defensive wall , but the polish keeper is able to handle it .
39. min .
double cross with no one to finish poland sends the ball across ecuador 's penalty box twice , but no one is there to turn the cross into a shot .
41. min .
pace picking up while still not a game that will leave a lasting impression on many people 's minds , the speed of the match has picked up , with the ball beginning to leave midfield more often since the ecuador goal .
43. min .
corner kick goes awry krzynowek 's corner kick sails above 19 heads and becomes a goal kick .
45. min .
half time whistle poland 's 5-man midfield has been keeping a better grip on the ball in the first half 's final minutes but still look shaky up front .
45. min .
into the locker room slightly favored going into the match , poland have n't been able to get their game started and are certain to get a talking to from coach janas in the locker room .
ecuador 's players will be encouraged to do more of the same in the second half and keep poland from pushing too far forward .
45. min .
few chances ball possession was been split right down the middle in the first 45 minutes , but with all four shots on goal coming from ecuador , poland have not been able to turn their time with the ball into chances to get on the board .
45. min .
players back on the field poland and ecuador get ready for the second half to begin .
48. min .
slowing it down again the players are back from the break , but no one seems too excited about being back on the pitch as passes go astray and men unmarked .
49. min .
corner poland poland get a chance on a corner , but krzynowek put the ball behind the goal and mora takes his time setting up the goal kick .
51. min .
ecuador intercepts poland and ecuador continue splitting time on the ball , but poland 's weak passes are being easily intercepted by the ecuadorian midfielders and defenders .
52. min .
great pass from szymkowiak ... ... but krzynowek is caught offsides .
54. min .
sobolewski breaks through the polish midfielder cuts through the defense and connects well but espinoza is able to clear with a slide tackle .
56. min .
juggling school is open reasco walks the ball down the touch line juggling it between his feet and past defenders with the ball bouncing on his head .
58. min .
valencia gets away with a foul and is able to send the ball forward to mendez , who wins a throw in deep in poland territory .
60. min .
jop goes down poland 's jop takes a hard foul to the leg .
he 's a bit slow getting back up , but he looks able to stay in the game .
62. min .
ecuador locks down the four-man south american defense has closed down every chance poland brings at it , denying the europeans any solid shots on goal and protecting their 1-0 lead .
64. min .
hurtado is hurt ecuador 's captain is hurt in a collision with smolarek and will need to leave the game .
65. min .
carlos tenorio out for ivan kaviedes 66. min .
captain is back hurtado is treated on the sidelines and is able to come back into the game with little more than a limp and a grimace .
67. min .
sobolewski makes room for ireneusz jelen 68. min .
hurtado is hurting hurtado decides he ca n't finish and hands the captain 's armband over to delgado and jorge guagua comes in .
69. min .
stop wasting time yellow card for mendez for slowing play .
71. min .
less than 20 minutes left in the game and poland is still trying to find their offensive players , while ecuador continue to be happy keeping the lead they have and are n't bothered pushing forward .
74. min .
ecuador counters on a fast-moving run from one end of the pitch to the other , ecuador decide to try their hand at offence , but the deciding pass is broken up in front of the goal .
77. min .
krzynowek steps off for kamil kosowski 79. min .
mora makes a mistake but only has to pay with the stress of a corner kick and the following shot that knocked over a cameraman 's gear on the side of the field .
80. min .
goal for ecuador 81. min .
delgado puts the game on ice augstin delgado inches through an offsides trap and slams home a pass from kaviedes to silence gelsenkirchen 's polish fans .
83. min .
subs on both sides ecuador : patricio urrita takes over for delgado .
poland : pawel brozek in for zurawski .
86. min .
poland 's only chance so far jelen turns and takes a shot on goal that ricochets off the post , forcing jelen to grasp at the few hairs left on his head .
87. min .
jelen makes another chance poland is trying to crash ecuador 's shut-out party sending all but two players into the ecuador penalty area .
89. min .
limping to the end kosowski is fouled and limps his way back to the ball to try and salvage at least a goal .
89. min .
ding pawel brozek has only been in the game a few minutes but manages to send the ball careening off the post .
91. min .
extra time begins the fourth official puts up the board announcing four minutes of injury time .
93. min .
kaviedes breaks free on the wing , but none of his players is willing to run forward to receive a pass .
94. min .
that 's it !
japan 's referee toru kamikawa looks at his watch and puts and end to the second game of the 2006 world cup . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9799 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 09.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 27.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 09.06.2006 live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . poland vs. ecuador from gelsenkirchen poland and ecuador face each other in the second game of the 2006 fifa world cup at the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen .
after germany got off to a good winning start both teams will have to go for the win to keep up with the group a leaders if they want to finish on top .
match 2 starts soon nerves in germany are beginning to calm after their win against costa rica , but the butterflies are just starting to flutter in the stomachs of soccer fans in poland and ecuador .
stay with dw-world.de for all the action starting at 21:00 utc .
the anthems have started !
the second game of the 2006 world cup is about to get underway as poland and ecuador meet in the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen . here 's a look at the two teams ' line ups : poland : 1 .
boruc artur -lrb- gk -rrb- , 2 .
jop mariusz , 6 .
bak jacek , 7 .
sobolewski radoslaw , 8 .
krzynowek jacek , 9 .
zurawski maciej , 10 .
szymkowiak miroslav , 14 .
zewlakow michal , 15 .
smolarek ebi , 16 .
radomski arkadiusz ecuador : 12 .
mora cristian -lrb- gk -rrb- , 3 .
hurtado ivan -lrb- c -rrb- , 4 .
de la cruz ulises , 8 .
mendez edison , 11 .
delgado agustin , 14 .
castillo segundo , 16 .
valencia luis , 17 .
espinoza giovanny , 18 .
reasco neicer , 20 .
tenorio edwin , 21 .
tenorio carlos referee : toru kamikawa -lrb- japan -rrb- 1. min .
poland-ecuador is underway !
there 's the whistle , and poland start with the ball .
2. min .
poland practices passing poland is keeping control of the ball in their defensive third and win the first foul of the game .
3. min .
poland comes forward on their second drive of the match and the crowd raises its whistles as smolarek falls without receiving a foul .
5. min .
ecuadorian pride ecuador 's goalie mora gets his first chance to handle the ball and show off the ecuadorian colors he 's painted on his face .
7. min .
valencia gets off the first shot of the game , but it was nothing for boruc to worry about as it rolled well wide of goal .
7. min .
corner for poland krzynowek wins a corner but it 's cleared by the defense .
9. min .
ouch .
poland captain bak clears the ball out of the penalty area and is rewarded with an elbow to the head from carlos tenorio .
11. min .
throw in ecuador ecuador win a throw in deep in poland territory and castillo is able to get off a shot boruc handles well .
12. min .
miscommunication mixed signals on the part of poland rob zurawski of a chance on goal as the 1-2 pass is broken up .
14. min .
foul for poland krzynowek wins a foul 35 yards out and takes it himself .
15. min .
high and wide but he puts the ball way above the goal and high into the stands .
18. min .
free kick poland de la cruz tosses smolarek to the ground and poland lines up a kick .
18. min .
set it up again the kick bounces off the wall and poland gets ready for another corner , which they are n't able to turn into a chance on goal .
22. min .
have a seat jop gives tenorio a shove and the ecuadorian goes sailing , but does n't manage to get enough on his head on the ensuing free kick to find the back of the net .
22. min .
goal ecuador 22. min .
long throw , big head mendez flicks on a massive throw in from de la cruz and carlos tenorio proves how dangerous he can be heading the ball past a diving boruc to score his first goal with the national team .
26. min .
ecuador energized the goal has brought new life into what looked like an initially lackadaisical ecuadorian side .
now the passes are getting crisper and reaching their target more often .
28. min .
another long throw , but no conversion de la cruz tosses in another streaker that falls to delgado 's foot , but he puts it over the crossbar .
30. min .
radomski gives up foul poland gives up another foul , but this one is well out of ecuador 's shooting distance .
31. min .
yellow for hurtado the ecuadorian captain gets the first card of the game for steamrolling radomski .
33. min .
another chance for ecuador de la cruz takes another walk with the ball through the polish defense but his shot is cleared by the defense .
35. min .
smolarek gets yellow smolarek slides into edwin tenorio with an extended leg and gets a well-deserved booking .
38. min .
boruc stops rifle mendez fires a shot through a defensive wall , but the polish keeper is able to handle it .
39. min .
double cross with no one to finish poland sends the ball across ecuador 's penalty box twice , but no one is there to turn the cross into a shot .
41. min .
pace picking up while still not a game that will leave a lasting impression on many people 's minds , the speed of the match has picked up , with the ball beginning to leave midfield more often since the ecuador goal .
43. min .
corner kick goes awry krzynowek 's corner kick sails above 19 heads and becomes a goal kick .
45. min .
half time whistle poland 's 5-man midfield has been keeping a better grip on the ball in the first half 's final minutes but still look shaky up front .
45. min .
into the locker room slightly favored going into the match , poland have n't been able to get their game started and are certain to get a talking to from coach janas in the locker room .
ecuador 's players will be encouraged to do more of the same in the second half and keep poland from pushing too far forward .
45. min .
few chances ball possession was been split right down the middle in the first 45 minutes , but with all four shots on goal coming from ecuador , poland have not been able to turn their time with the ball into chances to get on the board .
45. min .
players back on the field poland and ecuador get ready for the second half to begin .
48. min .
slowing it down again the players are back from the break , but no one seems too excited about being back on the pitch as passes go astray and men unmarked .
49. min .
corner poland poland get a chance on a corner , but krzynowek put the ball behind the goal and mora takes his time setting up the goal kick .
51. min .
ecuador intercepts poland and ecuador continue splitting time on the ball , but poland 's weak passes are being easily intercepted by the ecuadorian midfielders and defenders .
52. min .
great pass from szymkowiak ... ... but krzynowek is caught offsides .
54. min .
sobolewski breaks through the polish midfielder cuts through the defense and connects well but espinoza is able to clear with a slide tackle .
56. min .
juggling school is open reasco walks the ball down the touch line juggling it between his feet and past defenders with the ball bouncing on his head .
58. min .
valencia gets away with a foul and is able to send the ball forward to mendez , who wins a throw in deep in poland territory .
60. min .
jop goes down poland 's jop takes a hard foul to the leg .
he 's a bit slow getting back up , but he looks able to stay in the game .
62. min .
ecuador locks down the four-man south american defense has closed down every chance poland brings at it , denying the europeans any solid shots on goal and protecting their 1-0 lead .
64. min .
hurtado is hurt ecuador 's captain is hurt in a collision with smolarek and will need to leave the game .
65. min .
carlos tenorio out for ivan kaviedes 66. min .
captain is back hurtado is treated on the sidelines and is able to come back into the game with little more than a limp and a grimace .
67. min .
sobolewski makes room for ireneusz jelen 68. min .
hurtado is hurting hurtado decides he ca n't finish and hands the captain 's armband over to delgado and jorge guagua comes in .
69. min .
stop wasting time yellow card for mendez for slowing play .
71. min .
less than 20 minutes left in the game and poland is still trying to find their offensive players , while ecuador continue to be happy keeping the lead they have and are n't bothered pushing forward .
74. min .
ecuador counters on a fast-moving run from one end of the pitch to the other , ecuador decide to try their hand at offence , but the deciding pass is broken up in front of the goal .
77. min .
krzynowek steps off for kamil kosowski 79. min .
mora makes a mistake but only has to pay with the stress of a corner kick and the following shot that knocked over a cameraman 's gear on the side of the field .
80. min .
goal for ecuador 81. min .
delgado puts the game on ice augstin delgado inches through an offsides trap and slams home a pass from kaviedes to silence gelsenkirchen 's polish fans .
83. min .
subs on both sides ecuador : patricio urrita takes over for delgado .
poland : pawel brozek in for zurawski .
86. min .
poland 's only chance so far jelen turns and takes a shot on goal that ricochets off the post , forcing jelen to grasp at the few hairs left on his head .
87. min .
jelen makes another chance poland is trying to crash ecuador 's shut-out party sending all but two players into the ecuador penalty area .
89. min .
limping to the end kosowski is fouled and limps his way back to the ball to try and salvage at least a goal .
89. min .
ding pawel brozek has only been in the game a few minutes but manages to send the ball careening off the post .
91. min .
extra time begins the fourth official puts up the board announcing four minutes of injury time .
93. min .
kaviedes breaks free on the wing , but none of his players is willing to run forward to receive a pass .
94. min .
that 's it !
japan 's referee toru kamikawa looks at his watch and puts and end to the second game of the 2006 world cup . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

set it up again the kick bounces off the wall and poland gets ready for another corner , which they are n't able to turn into a chance on goal .
22. min .
have a seat jop gives tenorio a shove and the ecuadorian goes sailing , but does n't manage to get enough on his head on the ensuing free kick to find the back of the net .
22. min .
goal ecuador 22. min .
long throw , big head mendez flicks on a massive throw in from de la cruz and carlos tenorio proves how dangerous he can be heading the ball past a diving boruc to score his first goal with the national team .
26. min .
ecuador energized the goal has brought new life into what looked like an initially lackadaisical ecuadorian side .
now the passes are getting crisper and reaching their target more often .
28. min .
another long throw , but no conversion de la cruz tosses in another streaker that falls to delgado 's foot , but he puts it over the crossbar .
30. min .
radomski gives up foul poland gives up another foul , but this one is well out of ecuador 's shooting distance .
31. min .
yellow for hurtado the ecuadorian captain gets the first card of the game for steamrolling radomski .
33. min .
another chance for ecuador de la cruz takes another walk with the ball through the polish defense but his shot is cleared by the defense .
35. min .
smolarek gets yellow smolarek slides into edwin tenorio with an extended leg and gets a well-deserved booking .
38. min .
boruc stops rifle mendez fires a shot through a defensive wall , but the polish keeper is able to handle it .
39. min .
double cross with no one to finish poland sends the ball across ecuador 's penalty box twice , but no one is there to turn the cross into a shot .
41. min .
pace picking up while still not a game that will leave a lasting impression on many people 's minds , the speed of the match has picked up , with the ball beginning to leave midfield more often since the ecuador goal .
43. min .
corner kick goes awry krzynowek 's corner kick sails above 19 heads and becomes a goal kick .
45. min .
half time whistle poland 's 5-man midfield has been keeping a better grip on the ball in the first half 's final minutes but still look shaky up front .
45. min .
into the locker room slightly favored going into the match , poland have n't been able to get their game started and are certain to get a talking to from coach janas in the locker room .
ecuador 's players will be encouraged to do more of the same in the second half and keep poland from pushing too far forward .
45. min .
few chances ball possession was been split right down the middle in the first 45 minutes , but with all four shots on goal coming from ecuador , poland have not been able to turn their time with the ball into chances to get on the board .
45. min .
players back on the field poland and ecuador get ready for the second half to begin .
48. min .
slowing it down again the players are back from the break , but no one seems too excited about being back on the pitch as passes go astray and men unmarked .
49. min .
corner poland poland get a chance on a corner , but krzynowek put the ball behind the goal and mora takes his time setting up the goal kick .
51. min .
ecuador intercepts poland and ecuador continue splitting time on the ball , but poland 's weak passes are being easily intercepted by the ecuadorian midfielders and defenders .
52. min .
great pass from szymkowiak ... ... but krzynowek is caught offsides .
54. min .
sobolewski breaks through the polish midfielder cuts through the defense and connects well but espinoza is able to clear with a slide tackle .
56. min .
juggling school is open reasco walks the ball down the touch line juggling it between his feet and past defenders with the ball bouncing on his head .
58. min .
valencia gets away with a foul and is able to send the ball forward to mendez , who wins a throw in deep in poland territory .
60. min .
jop goes down poland 's jop takes a hard foul to the leg .
he 's a bit slow getting back up , but he looks able to stay in the game .
62. min .
ecuador locks down the four-man south american defense has closed down every chance poland brings at it , denying the europeans any solid shots on goal and protecting their 1-0 lead .
64. min .
hurtado is hurt ecuador 's captain is hurt in a collision with smolarek and will need to leave the game .
65. min .
carlos tenorio out for ivan kaviedes 66. min .
captain is back hurtado is treated on the sidelines and is able to come back into the game with little more than a limp and a grimace .
67. min .
sobolewski makes room for ireneusz jelen 68. min .
hurtado is hurting hurtado decides he ca n't finish and hands the captain 's armband over to delgado and jorge guagua comes in .
69. min .
stop wasting time yellow card for mendez for slowing play .
71. min .
less than 20 minutes left in the game and poland is still trying to find their offensive players , while ecuador continue to be happy keeping the lead they have and are n't bothered pushing forward .
74. min .
ecuador counters on a fast-moving run from one end of the pitch to the other , ecuador decide to try their hand at offence , but the deciding pass is broken up in front of the goal .
77. min .
krzynowek steps off for kamil kosowski 79. min .
mora makes a mistake but only has to pay with the stress of a corner kick and the following shot that knocked over a cameraman 's gear on the side of the field .
80. min .
goal for ecuador 81. min .
delgado puts the game on ice augstin delgado inches through an offsides trap and slams home a pass from kaviedes to silence gelsenkirchen 's polish fans .
83. min .
subs on both sides ecuador : patricio urrita takes over for delgado .
poland : pawel brozek in for zurawski .
86. min .
poland 's only chance so far jelen turns and takes a shot on goal that ricochets off the post , forcing jelen to grasp at the few hairs left on his head .
87. min .
jelen makes another chance poland is trying to crash ecuador 's shut-out party sending all but two players into the ecuador penalty area .
89. min .
limping to the end kosowski is fouled and limps his way back to the ball to try and salvage at least a goal .
89. min .
ding pawel brozek has only been in the game a few minutes but manages to send the ball careening off the post .
91. min .
extra time begins the fourth official puts up the board announcing four minutes of injury time .
93. min .
kaviedes breaks free on the wing , but none of his players is willing to run forward to receive a pass .
94. min .
that 's it !
japan 's referee toru kamikawa looks at his watch and puts and end to the second game of the 2006 world cup . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 09.06.2006 live ticker poland 0:2 ecuador review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . poland vs. ecuador from gelsenkirchen poland and ecuador face each other in the second game of the 2006 fifa world cup at the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen .
after germany got off to a good winning start both teams will have to go for the win to keep up with the group a leaders if they want to finish on top .
match 2 starts soon nerves in germany are beginning to calm after their win against costa rica , but the butterflies are just starting to flutter in the stomachs of soccer fans in poland and ecuador .
stay with dw-world.de for all the action starting at 21:00 utc .
the anthems have started !
the second game of the 2006 world cup is about to get underway as poland and ecuador meet in the fifa world cup stadium gelsenkirchen . here 's a look at the two teams ' line ups : poland : 1 .
boruc artur -lrb- gk -rrb- , 2 .
jop mariusz , 6 .
bak jacek , 7 .
sobolewski radoslaw , 8 .
krzynowek jacek , 9 .
zurawski maciej , 10 .
szymkowiak miroslav , 14 .
zewlakow michal , 15 .
smolarek ebi , 16 .
radomski arkadiusz ecuador : 12 .
mora cristian -lrb- gk -rrb- , 3 .
hurtado ivan -lrb- c -rrb- , 4 .
de la cruz ulises , 8 .
mendez edison , 11 .
delgado agustin , 14 .
castillo segundo , 16 .
valencia luis , 17 .
espinoza giovanny , 18 .
reasco neicer , 20 .
tenorio edwin , 21 .
tenorio carlos referee : toru kamikawa -lrb- japan -rrb- 1. min .
poland-ecuador is underway !
there 's the whistle , and poland start with the ball .
2. min .
poland practices passing poland is keeping control of the ball in their defensive third and win the first foul of the game .
3. min .
poland comes forward on their second drive of the match and the crowd raises its whistles as smolarek falls without receiving a foul .
5. min .
ecuadorian pride ecuador 's goalie mora gets his first chance to handle the ball and show off the ecuadorian colors he 's painted on his face .
7. min .
valencia gets off the first shot of the game , but it was nothing for boruc to worry about as it rolled well wide of goal .
7. min .
corner for poland krzynowek wins a corner but it 's cleared by the defense .
9. min .
ouch .
poland captain bak clears the ball out of the penalty area and is rewarded with an elbow to the head from carlos tenorio .
11. min .
throw in ecuador ecuador win a throw in deep in poland territory and castillo is able to get off a shot boruc handles well .
12. min .
miscommunication mixed signals on the part of poland rob zurawski of a chance on goal as the 1-2 pass is broken up .
14. min .
foul for poland krzynowek wins a foul 35 yards out and takes it himself .
15. min .
high and wide but he puts the ball way above the goal and high into the stands .
18. min .
free kick poland de la cruz tosses smolarek to the ground and poland lines up a kick .
18. min .
set it up again the kick bounces off the wall and poland gets ready for another corner , which they are n't able to turn into a chance on goal .
22. min .
have a seat jop gives tenorio a shove and the ecuadorian goes sailing , but does n't manage to get enough on his head on the ensuing free kick to find the back of the net .
22. min .
goal ecuador 22. min .

germany keeps visa requirements tight for world cup -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 09.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages dw-world.de deutsche welle about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search dw-world : extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 27.01.2010 home news world germany europe business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany map weather german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 09.06.2006 germany keeps visa requirements tight for world cup großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany hopes to limit the number of illegal immigrants entering during the world cup host nation germany waits to welcome the world to the world cup but it seems that some members of the global community are less welcome than others . the federal interior ministry has been dealing with the logistical headaches of securing the world cup from terrorists and hooligans as well as limiting an expected influx of sex workers and illegal immigrants hoping to set up in germany under the cover of the world cup . while difficult to assess , the security threat is at least one which german authorities can tackle with initiatives and contingency plans .
but the prospect of thousands of people flooding into the country with no intention of leaving after the tournament ends is less easy to deal with , although visa restrictions and increased border controls will at least strengthen the host nation 's hand . germany is preparing to suspend the free travel arrangements it has with certain neighbors under the european union 's schengen agreement and reimpose passport checks on the borders with denmark , austria , france , belgium , luxembourg and the netherlands . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany will reintroduce border controls with eu neighbors the threat of illegal immigrants entering germany during the world cup is a real one .
more than 3 million visitors are expected to come to germany for event but only 45,000 people from the 11 countries from where a visa is required have applied for the necessary entry documents .
the foreign ministry is bracing for a rush on visa applications while the interior ministry is fearing a flood of visitors who do not have the required papers . on top of that , there a further twenty countries , including mexico , costa rica and paraguay , which do not require visas . visa scams put germany on high alert the foreign ministry recently announced that it had uncovered a visa scam in one participating african country in which potential migrants were advised to throw away their passports on arrival and claim asylum .
officials in tunisia also announced recently that they suspected many of those queuing for visas to germany were not soccer fans but people desperate for a ticket to a job and a new life in europe . such news has put germany on high alert .
the federal government has not loosened its visa requirements for non-eu and non-western countries and as a result , fans of countries like ukraine may face disappointment when trying to enter the country to watch the games unless they can fulfill the visa criteria . german embassies around the world have issued warnings to foreign nationals intending to travel to the world cup that having a ticket for the games will not guarantee them a visa or entry . " may be turned back " bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : signing up for tickets ; not applying for a visa the announcements also advise fans that the best way of getting a visa is to have documents proving they have a job , travel health insurance and a return plane ticket .
visa applicants must also prove , in an interview , that they are on a short-term visit and have the funds to travel while in germany . " there will always be applicants , especially from poor countries , who want to come here and stay for economic reasons , " a german foreign ministry spokesperson told dw-world.de.
" it 's a bigger problem at the moment with many coming and claiming to visit the world cup . " " if they ca n't prove they can pay , they may be turned back , " the spokesperson said . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de dw-world : ahmadinejad would face cool reception at world cup berlin was reserved in its response to iran 's president saying he would come to the world cup if his team made it beyond the first round .
the head of germany 's soccer association , however , said he would get an earful .
-lrb- june 5 , 2006 -rrb- dw-world : human trafficking scandal rocks ecuador national team ecuador coach luis fernando suarez , whose side will face germany in its final world cup group stage match on june 20 in berlin , played down the human trafficking scandal ecuadorian national soccer association fef was currently embroiled in .
-lrb- april 15 , 2006 -rrb- dw-world : person-to-person world cup ticket exchanges banned by court in a blow to soccer fans intent on exchanging world cup tickets on the black market , the german soccer federation -lrb- dfb -rrb- won a court ruling thursday that will make unofficial transactions between ticket holders void .
-lrb- april 26 , 2006 -rrb- www-links externer link : fifa world cup 2006 the official homepage of the 2006 fifa world cup in germany .

readers ' corner germany 's defeat dw-world.de readers were crushed by germany 's defeat in the world cup but saw a silver lining . © dw 2010 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

bbc news -pipe- business -pipe- ford 's credit rating cut further home news sport radio tv weather languages low graphics -pipe- accessibility help one-minute world news news services your news when you want it news front page africa americas asia-pacific europe middle east south asia uk business market data economy companies health science & environment technology entertainment also in the news - video and audio - programmes have your say in pictures country profiles special reports related bbc sites sport weather on this day editors ' blog last updated : friday , 9 june 2006 , 05:10 gmt 06:10 uk e-mail this to a friend printable version ford 's credit rating cut further ford is trying to transform its us business struggling us car giant ford has had its credit rating cut further into junk territory , a fresh blow for the firm as it tries to turnaround its fortunes .
fitch ratings said it had carried out the move because it expects ford 's revenues will continue to deteriorate throughout 2006 .
in april ford announced a $ 1.19bn -lrb- £ 629m -rrb- quarterly loss as it struggles against weak sales in the us .
a poor credit rating makes it harder for a company to borrow money .
it indicates that a firm is more likely to default on a loan , meaning the company in question faces much higher interest rates .
' deteriorating product range ' fitch ratings said ford 's revenues were continuing to struggle " due to continued market share losses , deteriorating -lsb- product -rsb- mix , price competition , a lack of key product introductions , coupled with lack of tangible progress in reducing its cost structure " .
ford is cutting 30,000 jobs and closing 14 plants by 2012 to reduce its costs .
while analysts have criticised ford 's vehicle range in the us , the firm 's sales have also been hit by higher fuel costs .
to help temper us motorists ' concerns about soaring petrol prices , ford announced earlier this month that it is to give away at least $ 1,000 -lrb- £ 540 -rrb- of fuel with new vehicles .
rival general motors has also started a similar scheme .
e-mail this to a friend printable version globalisation how it affects the car industry geneva motor show 2008 small cars will be the stars green sports car set for launch fiat lanuches new lancia detroit motor show 2008 detroit 's desperate struggle china eye us car market chrysler 's stampede into motown hyundai targets luxury market green future , distant dream ?

bbc news -pipe- business -pipe- ford 's credit rating cut further home news sport radio tv weather languages low graphics -pipe- accessibility help one-minute world news news services your news when you want it news front page africa americas asia-pacific europe middle east south asia uk business market data economy companies health science & environment technology entertainment also in the news - video and audio - programmes have your say in pictures country profiles special reports related bbc sites sport weather on this day editors ' blog last updated : friday , 9 june 2006 , 05:10 gmt 06:10 uk e-mail this to a friend printable version ford 's credit rating cut further ford is trying to transform its us business struggling us car giant ford has had its credit rating cut further into junk territory , a fresh blow for the firm as it tries to turnaround its fortunes .
fitch ratings said it had carried out the move because it expects ford 's revenues will continue to deteriorate throughout 2006 .
in april ford announced a $ 1.19bn -lrb- £ 629m -rrb- quarterly loss as it struggles against weak sales in the us .
a poor credit rating makes it harder for a company to borrow money .
it indicates that a firm is more likely to default on a loan , meaning the company in question faces much higher interest rates .
' deteriorating product range ' fitch ratings said ford 's revenues were continuing to struggle " due to continued market share losses , deteriorating -lsb- product -rsb- mix , price competition , a lack of key product introductions , coupled with lack of tangible progress in reducing its cost structure " .
ford is cutting 30,000 jobs and closing 14 plants by 2012 to reduce its costs .
while analysts have criticised ford 's vehicle range in the us , the firm 's sales have also been hit by higher fuel costs .
to help temper us motorists ' concerns about soaring petrol prices , ford announced earlier this month that it is to give away at least $ 1,000 -lrb- £ 540 -rrb- of fuel with new vehicles .
rival general motors has also started a similar scheme .
e-mail this to a friend printable version globalisation how it affects the car industry geneva motor show 2008 small cars will be the stars green sports car set for launch fiat lanuches new lancia detroit motor show 2008 detroit 's desperate struggle china eye us car market chrysler 's stampede into motown hyundai targets luxury market green future , distant dream ?

how iran has been registering ships in the isle of man cultural pride taiwan 's efforts to revive indigenous languages most popular now most popular now -pipe- 47,414 people are reading stories on the site right now . bbc news -pipe- business -pipe- ford 's credit rating cut further home news sport radio tv weather languages low graphics -pipe- accessibility help one-minute world news news services your news when you want it news front page africa americas asia-pacific europe middle east south asia uk business market data economy companies health science & environment technology entertainment also in the news - video and audio - programmes have your say in pictures country profiles special reports related bbc sites sport weather on this day editors ' blog last updated : friday , 9 june 2006 , 05:10 gmt 06:10 uk e-mail this to a friend printable version ford 's credit rating cut further ford is trying to transform its us business struggling us car giant ford has had its credit rating cut further into junk territory , a fresh blow for the firm as it tries to turnaround its fortunes .
fitch ratings said it had carried out the move because it expects ford 's revenues will continue to deteriorate throughout 2006 .
in april ford announced a $ 1.19bn -lrb- £ 629m -rrb- quarterly loss as it struggles against weak sales in the us .
a poor credit rating makes it harder for a company to borrow money .
it indicates that a firm is more likely to default on a loan , meaning the company in question faces much higher interest rates .
' deteriorating product range ' fitch ratings said ford 's revenues were continuing to struggle " due to continued market share losses , deteriorating -lsb- product -rsb- mix , price competition , a lack of key product introductions , coupled with lack of tangible progress in reducing its cost structure " .

rival general motors has also started a similar scheme .
